item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description:
Education

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Economics at Université Paris-Dauphine-PSL (2019-2022)
  • Master’s Degree (Year 1) in Economics at the Paris School of Economics (2022-2023)
  • Master’s Degree (Year 2) in Operations Research at Université Paris-Dauphine-PSL (2023-2024)
  • PhD in Computer Science at Sorbonne Université (ongoing)

Teaching Experience

  • Python, First year undergraduate students
  • C, First year undergraduate students
